name: Tyrants of Paradise
description:
The following is a prototype for a larger game I plan on releasing any and all feedback would be appreciated 

65 million years ago a catastrophic event lead to the complete extinction of all dinosaurs… Or did it? What if Armageddon could be prevented? This is that tale, the tale of tyrants protecting paradise.

What is Tyrants Of Paradise?

Tyrants Of Paradise is a beat em up platformer with a emphasis on combos and being stylish.  Each character will be able to swap between 3 different fighting styles in order to mix up combat, and  help out in different combat scenarios .
